section.section: In this section the following words have the meanings indicated.

"On duty" does not include attendance of a member of a volunteer company at a social function unless a written bylaw or rule of government adopted for the volunteer company requires the attendance or participation of the member.

text.section:
An individual who is a covered employee under subsection (h)(2), (k), (n), (o)(2), (p)(1)(ii), (r)(3), (v), or (x)(1) of this section continues to be a covered employee while:
accompanying an accident or fire victim who is being transported to a hospital in a helicopter; and
returning to the home station of the individual after accompanying a victim under item (1) of this subsection.

section.section: Unless an election is made under paragraph (2) of this subsection, a member of a volunteer company in Allegany County is not a covered employee.
The Board of County Commissioners for Allegany County may provide by resolution for members of a volunteer company in the county to be covered employees while on duty.

text.section: A member of a volunteer company in Anne Arundel County is a covered employee while on duty.
A member of a volunteer company in Baltimore County is a covered employee while on duty.
A member of a volunteer company in Calvert County is a covered employee while on duty.
A member of a volunteer company in Caroline County is a covered employee while on duty.

section.section: Unless an election is made in accordance with this subsection, a member of a volunteer company in Carroll County is not a covered employee.
A volunteer fire company in Carroll County may elect to make its members covered employees.
A volunteer fire company that elects to make its members covered employees shall pay the premium for the coverage.
A member of a volunteer company in Cecil County who meets the guidelines set under paragraph (2) of this subsection is a covered employee while on duty.
The Board of County Commissioners of Cecil County may set guidelines to determine the eligibility of members of a volunteer company in the county for coverage under this subsection.
The guidelines under paragraph (2) of this subsection may not limit the number of covered employees in a volunteer company.
Unless an election is made in accordance with this subsection, a member of a volunteer company in Charles County is not a covered employee.
The Board of County Commissioners of Charles County may provide by resolution for members of a volunteer company in the county to be covered employees while on duty.

text.section: A member of a volunteer company in Dorchester County is a covered employee.
A member of a volunteer company in Frederick County is a covered employee while on duty.

section.section: Unless an election is made under paragraph (2) of this subsection, a member of a volunteer company in Garrett County is not a covered employee.
The Board of County Commissioners for Garrett County may provide by resolution for members of a volunteer company in the county to be covered employees while on duty.

text.section: A member of a volunteer company in Harford County is a covered employee.

An individual is a covered employee:
while on duty as an actively participating member of a volunteer company in Howard County; or
if not covered under item (1) of this subsection, while a member of a volunteer company in Howard County participating in the activities of the volunteer company.

section.section:
An individual is a covered employee:
while on duty as an actively participating member of a volunteer company in Kent County; or
if not covered under item (i) of this paragraph, while a member of a volunteer company in Kent County.
The Board of County Commissioners of Kent County shall impose annually a tax on assessable property in the county in an amount that is sufficient to pay for coverage under this subsection.
The Board of County Commissioners of Kent County may limit the number of members in a volunteer company in the county.

text.section: A member of a volunteer company in Montgomery County is a covered employee while on duty.

An individual is a covered employee:
while on duty as a member of the Laurel volunteer rescue squad in Prince George's County; or
while a member of a volunteer company in Prince George's County.
A member of a volunteer company in Queen Anne's County is a covered employee while on duty.

section.section: Unless an election is made under paragraph (2) of this subsection, a member of a volunteer company in St. Mary's County is not a covered employee.
The Board of County Commissioners for St. Mary's County may provide by resolution for the members of a volunteer company in the county to be covered employees while on duty.
Unless an election is made under paragraph (2) of this subsection, a member of a volunteer company in Somerset County is not a covered employee.
The Board of County Commissioners for Somerset County may provide by resolution for members of a volunteer company in the county to be covered employees while on duty.
A member of a volunteer company in Talbot County is a covered employee.
The County Council of Talbot County may provide by resolution for members of a volunteer company in the county to be covered employees while on duty.
Unless an election is made under paragraph (2) of this subsection, a member of a volunteer company in Washington County is not a covered employee.
The Board of County Commissioners for Washington County may provide by resolution for members of a volunteer company in the county to be covered employees while on duty.
A member of a volunteer company in Wicomico County is a covered employee.
The County Council of Wicomico County may provide by resolution for members of a volunteer company in the county to be covered employees while on duty.
Unless an election is made under paragraph (2) of this subsection, a member of a volunteer company in Worcester County is not a covered employee.
The Board of County Commissioners for Worcester County may provide by resolution for members of a volunteer company in the county to be covered employees while on duty.

For the purposes of this title, a member of a volunteer company who is a covered employee under this section is an employee of the political subdivision of the State where the volunteer company is organized.
A member of a volunteer company shall be covered while on duty by a policy of workers' compensation insurance.

text.section: A member of a volunteer company who is a covered employee under this section may not be considered a paid covered employee of the volunteer company for receiving as a membership benefit a yearly stipend of $5,200 or less to help offset out-of-pocket expenses.
